de.common.guildPremium:
This feature is only available for premium guilds.

If you enjoy using KyuBot, please consider donating. Donations allow you to unlock **extra features** and also allow us to keep hosting, developing, and creating content updates for the bot.

**Premium Perks**

- Customise rank cards for all members
- Configure global, channel, or role multiplier for text/voice exp
- Configure cooldown for text/voice exp
- Disable voting exp booster
- Enable lootbox events
- Automatic leaderboard updates in a specific channel
- Configure server leaderboard as an image
- Access to music player (Experimental feature)
- Sneak peaks/Early access to new features
- Donator badge for rank card

**Dashboard perks**

- Custom vanity url for server leaderboard
- Custom banner for server leaderboard
- Join server button on the server leaderboard

de.common.userPremium:
This feature is only available for premium users.

If you enjoy using KyuBot, please consider donating. Donations allow you to unlock **extra features** and also allow us to keep hosting, developing, and creating content updates for the bot.

**Premium Perks**

- Customise rank card background
- Customise rank card color
- Customise rank card opacity
- Customise rank card progress bar
- Give/remove experience from members (requires admin)
- Access to music player (Experimental feature)
- Sneakpeaks/Early access to new features
- Donator badge for rank card

en-GB.common.guildPremium:
This feature is only available for premium guilds.

If you enjoy using KyuBot, please consider donating. Donations allow you to unlock **extra features** and also allow us to keep hosting, developing, and creating content updates for the bot.

**Premium Perks**

- Customise rank cards for all members
- Configure global, channel, or role multiplier for text/voice exp
- Configure cooldown for text/voice exp
- Disable voting exp booster
- Enable lootbox events
- Automatic leaderboard updates in a specific channel
- Configure server leaderboard as an image
- Access to music player (Experimental feature)
- Sneak peaks/Early access to new features
- Donator badge for rank card

**Dashboard perks**

- Custom vanity url for server leaderboard
- Custom banner for server leaderboard
- Join server button on the server leaderboard
en-GB.common.hierarchyError: Assurez-vous que le rôle de Kyubot est supérieur à %s dans la hiérarchie des rôles.
en-GB.common.unknownError: Un problème est survenu lors de l'exécution de la commande. Si cette erreur persiste, veuillez contacter mon équipe de développement.
en-GB.common.userPremium:
This feature is only available for premium users.

If you enjoy using KyuBot, please consider donating. Donations allow you to unlock **extra features** and also allow us to keep hosting, developing, and creating content updates for the bot.

**Premium Perks**

- Customise rank card background
- Customise rank card color
- Customise rank card opacity
- Customise rank card progress bar
- Give/remove experience from members (requires admin)
- Access to music player (Experimental feature)
- Sneakpeaks/Early access to new features
- Donator badge for rank card

es-ES.common.guildPremium:
This feature is only available for premium guilds.

If you enjoy using KyuBot, please consider donating. Donations allow you to unlock **extra features** and also allow us to keep hosting, developing, and creating content updates for the bot.

**Premium Perks**

- Customise rank cards for all members
- Configure global, channel, or role multiplier for text/voice exp
- Configure cooldown for text/voice exp
- Disable voting exp booster
- Enable lootbox events
- Automatic leaderboard updates in a specific channel
- Configure server leaderboard as an image
- Access to music player (Experimental feature)
- Sneak peaks/Early access to new features
- Donator badge for rank card

**Dashboard perks**

- Custom vanity url for server leaderboard
- Custom banner for server leaderboard
- Join server button on the server leaderboard
es-ES.common.hierarchyError: Assurez-vous que le rôle de Kyubot est supérieur à %s dans la hiérarchie des rôles.
es-ES.common.unknownError: Un problème est survenu lors de l'exécution de la commande. Si cette erreur persiste, veuillez contacter mon équipe de développement.
es-ES.common.userPremium:
This feature is only available for premium users.

If you enjoy using KyuBot, please consider donating. Donations allow you to unlock **extra features** and also allow us to keep hosting, developing, and creating content updates for the bot.

**Premium Perks**

- Customise rank card background
- Customise rank card color
- Customise rank card opacity
- Customise rank card progress bar
- Give/remove experience from members (requires admin)
- Access to music player (Experimental feature)
- Sneakpeaks/Early access to new features
- Donator badge for rank card

es-ES.embed.helpDescription: Modifier les paramètres pour les annonces.
embed.helpUsage: Définit si les annonces sont envoyées avec des embeds ou sans.```/embed toggle <disable/enable> [level]```
Activer/désactiver les pings pour les messages d'annonce.```/embed ping <disable/enable> [level]```

Personnalisez les différentes sections des embeds intégrés. ``/embed customise title <input> [level]
/embed customise description <input> [level]
/embed customise image <input> [level]
/embed customise color <input> [level]```
Ajoute un embed pour un niveau spécifique.```/embed add <level>```
Enlever un embed pour un niveau spécifique.```/embed remove <level>```
Teste le message d'annonce actuel.```/embed test [level]```
Récupère une liste de toutes les variables disponibles pour KyuBot.```/embed variables```

Affiche une liste des commandes et salons actuellement ignorés.```/ignore show```

rewards.helpUsage: Définir le rôle à donner lorsqu'un membre atteint le niveau spécifié.```/rewards add <level> <role>```
